q1.a: Base Framework is a modern Next.js starter template with authentication, i18n, and best practices built-in.

q2.a: Clone the repository, install dependencies with npm install, and run npm run dev to start the development server.

q3.a: Yes, Base Framework is open source and free to use for personal and commercial projects.

q4.a: Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, shadcn/ui, and Better Auth.
